summary: An ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller of the City of Seattle, to execute a supplemental agreement waiving the right to purchase timber owned by the Northern Pacific Railway Company and the Northern Improvement Company, located on certain sections of land in Township 22 North, Range 8 East, W.M., and in Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W. M., as described in an agreement entered into between the City of Seattle, the Northern Pacific Railway Company and the Northwestern Improvement Company, on August 11, 1913, filed of record in Volume 89 of Deeds, page 247, Records of King County, Washington, and authorized by Ordinance No. 31706.
